We think there may be another group racing to publish these findings. In order to prove the date at which you saw this document, we would like for you to be a part of ''Peer Publishing'' this report. 

* Go to '''Domain Manifest Generator''' in your ''PKC'', and click on ''Generate Domain Manifest''.
** This will generate an anonymous hash of the state of your database, verifying that our document ''New Observations on Jupiter'' was present there at present there at this time. 

* Then, go to '''Domain Manifest Publisher''' and click ''Publish'' next to the newly generated ''Domain Manifest''
** Follow the steps on MetaMask in order to publish this manifest hash to the Ethereum Blockchain, and prove immutably that you saw this document from us first. 
** Once you have published this to the blockchain, you can click the link to view it on Etherscan.

* Finally, please go to '''Export Verified Page''' in your PKC, and use the dialogue there to export ''New Observations on Jupiter'' as an .xml file
** This new file includes your signature, please email it to ''tutorial_aqua@inblock.io'' and we will collect it for peer review.
